Detailed Description

cvmx_usbdrd::_uahc_gusb3pipectl#

This register is used to configure the core after power-on. It contains USB 3.0 and USB 3.0 PHY-related configuration parameters. The application must program this register before starting any transactions on either the SoC bus or the USB. Per-port registers are implemented.

Do not make changes to this register after the initial programming.
